historyDescription:
Government Boys Science Secondary School, Jere, is a landmark educational institution in Kaduna State, Nigeria. The school was officially commissioned on 29th May 2024 by the Executive Governor of Kaduna State, Senator Uba Sani.  

Its establishment was part of a broader initiative supported by the Islamic Development Bank (IsDB), aimed at improving access to quality science and technology education in the region. The project reflects Kaduna State’s commitment to strengthening secondary education, particularly in the sciences, to prepare young students for future opportunities in higher education and professional careers.  

The commissioning of the school marked a significant milestone in the state’s educational development agenda, symbolizing both international collaboration and local government dedication to human capital development. Today, Government Boys Science Secondary School, Jere, stands as a beacon of learning, designed to nurture future scientists, innovators, and leaders from the community.
